title: Resurrection
description: On the day she took her own life, Kaia was not surprised to find herself at the entrance to Hell. What she didn't expect was to be offered a job as a Guard by the angel in charge.Once she accepts, Kaia must help to find a lost soul who is meant to be a guard, but time is running out for the keepers of hell as Balthazar continues to evade them.All the while, Kaia is coming to terms with the family she lost. She knew she belonged in Hell, what she didn't know was that it would be her resurrection.
author: Danielle James
